Q2a-3methods.name: name
Q2a-3methods.question: Which two methods do you expect to yield values that are closest to each other?

feedback.correct: Well done, this is correct! Method 1 and 3 get very close to the exact solution. Method 2 is an approximation (but a very good one!)
feedback.incorrect: Oops, there seems to be a mistake. Which of the three methods is an approximation?

Q2a-iterative_deepwater_L0.name: on hold
Q2a-iterative_deepwater_L0.question: What is the deep water wavelength (L0)?

feedback.correct: Indeed, the deep water wavelength is in this way related to the wave period.
feedback.incorrect: There is a mistake, the only variable is the wave period.
